mapper.select: select * from (select VersionID, VersionDate, VersionNum, VideoTitle, UserID, UserName, AvatarUUID from user, version, fork where userid = version_userid and version_forkid = forkid and forkid = #{forkID} and isagree = 1 union all select VersionID, VersionDate, VersionNum, VideoTitle, UserID, UserName, AvatarUUID from user, project, version, fork where userid = project_userid and Fork_ProjectID=ProjectID and version_forkid = forkid and forkid = #{forkID})a;
mapper.insert: insert into BulletComment(content, date, sendtime, BulletComment_VersionID, BulletComment_UserID) value (#{content},#{date},#{sendTime},#{versionID},#{userID});
